title: Ride London 2016
desc: Ride London 100 takes place on Sunday 31 July. Starting in Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, you will pedal 100 miles of closed roads through the capital into Surrey?s stunning countryside, finishing on The Mall in central London. Be one of 25,000 people taking part in this challenging, exhilarating day. Registration costs ?50 and we ask that you raise a minimum of ?450 to secure your space. Registration closes at end of April 2016 We rely solely on the generosity of people like you and without your support, Meningitis Now would not exist. We are committed in our fight against meningitis and, with help from people like you, we can beat this brutal disease. ? Please sign up today and make a big difference to the lives of people facing the devastation of meningitis right now. Call us on 0345 120 4530 or email   to find out more about the event
